title: Walks as words
content: In general, a walk is an alternating sequence of vertices and edges, as defined in ~ df-wlks : p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n). Often, it is sufficient to refer to a walk by the natural sequence of its vertices, i.e omitting its edges in its representation: p(0) p(1) ... p(n-1) p(n), see the corresponding remark in [Diestel] p. 6. The concept of a ` Word `, see ~ df-word , is the appropriate way to define such a sequence (being finite and starting at index 0) of vertices. Therefore, it is used in definitions ~ df-wwlks and ~ df-wwlksn , and the representation of a walk as sequence of its vertices is called "walk as word". Only for simple pseudographs, however, the edges can be uniquely reconstructed from such a representation. In other cases, there could be more than one edge between two adjacent vertices in the walk (in a multigraph), or two adjacent vertices could be connected by two different hyperedges involving additional vertices (in a hypergraph).

df-wwlks
blocks.content: Define the set of all walks (in an undirected graph) as words over the set of vertices. Such a word corresponds to the sequence p(0) p(1) ... p(n-1) p(n) of the vertices in a walk p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n) as defined in ~ df-wlks . ` w = (/) ` has to be excluded because a walk always consists of at least one vertex, see ~ wlkn0 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: df-wwlksn
blocks.content: Define the set of all walks (in an undirected graph) of a fixed length n as words over the set of vertices. Such a word corresponds to the sequence p(0) p(1) ... p(n) of the vertices in a walk p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n) as defined in ~ df-wlks . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: df-wwlksnon
blocks.content: Define the collection of walks of a fixed length with particular endpoints as word over the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-wwlksnon(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cwwlksnon, cmpo(s0, s1, cn0, universe, cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cvtx, cv(s1)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s1)), crab(s4, co(cv(s0), cwwlksn, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s4), nat0), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s4), cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-wwlksnon(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ WWalksNOn =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Vtx ` s1), s3 ‚àà(Vtx ` s1)‚Ü¶ { s4 ‚àà(s0[WWalksN]s1)|((s4 ` 0)= s2 ‚àß(s4 ` s0)= s3)}))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: wwlks
blocks.content: The set of walks (in an undirected graph) as words over the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)

thm wwlks(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cwwlks, c0), crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cwwlks, c0), crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cwwlks, c0, crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))), universe, crab(s0, cword(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0))), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(cedg, cv(hs0)))))), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  df-wwlks(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, cword(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0))), cword(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(cedg, cv(hs0))))), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cword(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0))), cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cvtx)
  wrdeq(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), c1)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(cedg, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))
  ralbidv(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(cedg, cv(hs0))), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))
  eleq2d(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cfv(cedg, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cedg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cedg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cedg)
  id(wcel(c0, universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))), universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cword(c1), universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cvtx, c0)
  wrdexg(c1, universe)
  rabexg(s0, cword(c1), universe, wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cwwlks, c0), crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cwwlks)
  sylibr(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))), emptycls), wral(s0, cword(c1), wn(wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))))))
  ralrimiv(s0, cword(c1), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))))
  syl6bi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), cword(c1)), wn(wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  syl6bb(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), cword(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cword(emptycls)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cword(c1), cword(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cword(c1), cword(emptycls)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cvtx, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cvtx)
  wrdeq(c1, emptycls)
  0wrd0(cv(s0))
  intnanrd(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))
  biimpri(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wne(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  nne(cv(s0), emptycls)
  rabeq0(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cword(c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cpr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.cword.s(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, cv(hs0))
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.cword.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c0, universe))

}
blocks.pretty:
thm wwlks(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (WWalks ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà Word(c1)|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))}
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((WWalks ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà Word(c1)|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmptd3(hs0, cwwlks, c0, { s0 ‚àà Word(c1)|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))}, universe, { s0 ‚àà Word((Vtx ` hs0))|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà(Edg ` hs0)))}, universe, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  df-wwlks(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, Word((Vtx ` hs0)), Word(c1), hs0 = c0, (s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà(Edg ` hs0))), (s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2)))
  syl(hs0 = c0, Word((Vtx ` hs0))= Word(c1), (Vtx ` hs0)= c1)
  syl6eqr((Vtx ` hs0), c1, (Vtx ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cvtx)
  wrdeq((Vtx ` hs0), c1)
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà(Edg ` hs0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))
  ralbidv(s1, (0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), hs0 = c0, {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà(Edg ` hs0), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2)
  eleq2d({(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))}, (Edg ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Edg ` hs0), c2, (Edg ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cedg)
  id(c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, { s0 ‚àà Word(c1)|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))} ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, Word(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c1, cvtx, c0)
  wrdexg(c1, universe)
  rabexg(s0, Word(c1), universe, (s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2)))
  eqtr4d((WWalks ` c0), { s0 ‚àà Word(c1)|(s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(0[..^]((# ` s0)[-]1)), {(s0 ` s1),(s0 `(s1[+]1))} ‚àà c2))}, emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, cwwlks)

  imp(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wcel(c0, cword(c3)))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wcel(c0, cword(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cwwlks, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cwwlks, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  iswwlksn(c1, c0, c2)

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

  imp((c1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), c0 ‚àà(c1[WWalksN]c2), c0 ‚àà Word(c3))

thm wspthsnon(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  ‚ä£ c3 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cwwspthsnon, c1, (s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(s0[(c0[WWalksNOn]c1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` c1)]s1)]s2)}), cn0, universe, (s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1), s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(s0[(hs0[WWalksNOn]hs1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` hs1)]s1)]s2)}), universe, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), WSPathsNOn =(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1), s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(s0[(hs0[WWalksNOn]hs1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` hs1)]s1)]s2)})))

  adantl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), (s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1), s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs1)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(s0[(hs0[WWalksNOn]hs1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` hs1)]s1)]s2)})=(s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(s0[(c0[WWalksNOn]c1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` c1)]s1)]s2)}))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, (Vtx ` hs1), (Vtx ` hs1), { s2 ‚àà(s0[(hs0[WWalksNOn]hs1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` hs1)]s1)]s2)}, c3, c3, { s2 ‚àà(s0[(c0[WWalksNOn]c1)]s1)| ‚àÉ(s3, s3[(s0[(SPathsOn ` c1)]s1)]s2)}, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (Vtx ` hs1)= c3)
  syl6eqr((Vtx ` hs1), c3, (Vtx ` c1), hs1 = c1)

  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))

blocks.name: iswwlksnon
blocks.content: The set of walks of a fixed length between two vertices as word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-May-2021.) (Revised by AV, 14-Mar-2022.)

thm iswwlksnon(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  ecase(wceq(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3)))), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4)))

  syl6eq(crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3))), emptycls, crab(s0, emptycls, wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3))), wn(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe))))
  rabeqdv(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3)))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c1, cn0, c2, universe, cwwlksn, crab(s0, cfv(cwwlks, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  df-wwlksn(hs0, hs1, s0)
  rab0(s0, wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), c3))), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))))
  pm2.61i(wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))), wceq(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), emptycls)), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))), wceq(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), emptycls))
  eqtrd(co(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3), emptycls, co(c0, cmpo(hs2, hs3, c4, c4, crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), cv(hs3))))), c3), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4)))))
  oveqd(c0, co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), c3, cmpo(hs2, hs3, c4, c4, crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), cv(hs3))))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))), wceq(co(c1, cwwlksnon, c2), cmpo(hs2, hs3, c4, c4, crab(s0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c1), cv(hs3)))))))

  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c1, cn0, c2, universe, cwwlksnon, cmpo(hs2, hs3, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs1)), crab(s0, co(cv(hs0), cwwlksn, cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs3))))))

  bitr4i(wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, cwwlksnon, c3), c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c2, cwwlksn, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, cwwlksn, c3)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c4))))

  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2)

blocks.name: wlkiswwlks
blocks.content: A walk as word corresponds to a walk in a simple pseudograph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm wlkiswwlks(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wb(wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0)))
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, cuspgr), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0))), wcel(c0, cupgr))
  uspgrupgr(c0)
  wlkiswwlks1(c0, cv(s0), c1)
  wlkiswwlks2(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cuspgr)
  diff.cuspgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cwwlks, c0)
  diff.cwwlks.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wlkiswwlks(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà USPGraph ‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1)‚Üî c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ‚àà USPGraph, ‚àÉ(s0, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1), c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0))
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ‚àà USPGraph, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1, c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà USPGraph, (s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0)), c0 ‚àà UPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(c0)
  wlkiswwlks1(c0, s0, c1)
  wlkiswwlks2(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cuspgr)
  diff.cuspgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, (WWalks ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cwwlks, c0)
  diff.cwwlks.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: wlkiswwlksupgr2
blocks.content: A walk as word corresponds to the sequence of vertices in a walk in a pseudograph. This variant of ~ wlkiswwlks2 does not require ` G ` to be a simple pseudograph, but it requires the Axiom of Choice ( ~ ac6 ) for its proof. Notice that only the existence of a function ` f ` can be proven, but, in general, it cannot be "constructed" (as in ~ wlkiswwlks2 ). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: wlkiswwlkupgr
blocks.content: A walk as word corresponds to a walk in a pseudograph. This variant of ~ wlkiswwlks does not require ` G ` to be a simple pseudograph, but it requires (indirectly) the Axiom of Choice for its proof. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm wlkiswwlkupgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wb(wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, cupgr), wex(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0)))
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, cupgr), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0)))
  wlkiswwlks1(c0, cv(s0), c1)
  wlkiswwlksupgr2(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cupgr)
  diff.cupgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cwwlks, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cwwlks, c0)
  diff.cwwlks.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wlkiswwlkupgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà UPGraph ‚Üí(‚àÉ(s0, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1)‚Üî c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ‚àà UPGraph, ‚àÉ(s0, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1), c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0))
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ‚àà UPGraph, s0[(Walks ` c0)]c1, c1 ‚àà(WWalks ` c0))
  wlkiswwlks1(c0, s0, c1)
  wlkiswwlksupgr2(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cupgr)
  diff.cupgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, (WWalks ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cwwlks, c0)
  diff.cwwlks.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: wlkswwlksen
blocks.content: The set of walks as words and the set of (ordinary) walks are equinumerous in a simple pseudograph. (Contributed by AV, 6-May-2021.) (Revised by AV, 5-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: wwlksm1edg
blocks.content: Removing the trailing edge from a walk (as word) with at least one edge results in a walk. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 19-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: wlklnwwlkln2

blocks.name: wlklnwwlklnupgr2
blocks.content: A walk of length ` N ` as word corresponds to the sequence of vertices in a walk of length ` N ` in a pseudograph. This variant of ~ wlklnwwlkln2 does not require ` G ` to be a simple pseudograph, but it requires (indirectly) the Axiom of Choice. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: wlknwwlksnen
blocks.content: In a simple pseudograph, the set of walks of a fixed length and the set of walks represented by words are equinumerous. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wlknwwlksnen(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cen, co(c1, cwwlksn, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cen, co(c1, cwwlksn, c0)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), co(c1, cwwlksn, c0)))
  wlknwwlksnbij(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), co(c1, cwwlksn, c0))
  eqid(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)))
  eqid(co(c1, cwwlksn, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))
  f1oen(cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), co(c1, cwwlksn, c0))
  rabex(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cwlks, c0)
  diff.cwlks.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Extension of a walk (as word) by adding an edge/vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: wwlksnredwwlkn0

} = {

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(c1 : c2 ‚Üí c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Vtx ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Edg ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { s0 ‚àà Word(c4)|((# ` s0)=(c0[+]2)‚àß(s0[prefix](c0[+]1))= c7 ‚àß {(lastS ` c7),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c6)}
  ‚ä£ c3 = { s1 ‚àà c4 | {(lastS ` c7), s1 } ‚àà c6 }

} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(c1 : c2 ‚Üí c3)), c4 =(Vtx ` c5))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(c1 : c2 ‚Üí c3)), c6 =(Edg ` c5))

  fveqeq2(s0, s2, chash, (c0[+]2))
  eqeq1d((s0[prefix](c0[+]1)), c7, (s2[prefix](c0[+]1)), s0 = s2)

  fveq2(s0, s2, clsw)

  syl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà Word(c4)‚àß((# ` s2)=(c0[+]2)‚àß(s2[prefix](c0[+]1))= c7 ‚àß {(lastS ` c7),(lastS ` s2)} ‚àà c6))), (lastS ` s2)‚àà c4, (s2 ‚àà Word(c4)‚àß s2 ‚â† ‚àÖ))

thm wwlksnextinj(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wf1(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, cword(c4), w3a(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), co(c0, caddc, nat2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c7), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c7), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c6))))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, c4, wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c7), cv(s1)), c6)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, c2, cfv(clsw, cv(s2))))

blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ wwlksnextbij0 as of 12-Oct-2022. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Apr-2021.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

thm wwlksnextbij0OLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wf1o(c3, c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvtx, c2))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, cword(c6), w3a(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), co(c1, caddc, nat2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), csubstr, cop(nat0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c7))))
  -| wceq(c5, crab(s1, c6, wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cv(s1)), c7)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s2, c4, cfv(clsw, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

blocks.name: wwlksnextbij
blocks.content: There is a bijection between the extensions of a walk (as word) by an edge and the set of vertices being connected to the trailing vertex of the walk. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 27-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: wwlksnexthasheq
blocks.content: The number of the extensions of a walk (as word) by an edge equals the number of vertices being connected to the trailing vertex of the walk. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 23-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 19-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 27-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wwlksnexthasheq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c3)))), cfv(chash, crab(s1, c4, wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  mpsyl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cwwlksn, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c3)))), cfv(chash, crab(s1, c4, wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))), wcel(crab(s0, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c3))), universe), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), crab(s0, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c3))), crab(s1, c4, wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))))

blocks.name: disjxwwlksn
blocks.content: Sets of walks (as words) extended by an edge are disjunct if each set contains extensions of distinct walks. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 19-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 27-Oct-2022.)

thm disjxwwlksn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wdisj(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wdisj(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4)))), wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1)))
  a1ii(wdisj(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4)))), wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c1)))
  mp2(wdisj(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4)))), wral(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), wss(crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4))), crab(s1, cword(c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0))))), wdisj(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)))))
  rgenw(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), wss(crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4))), crab(s1, cword(c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)))))
  ss2rabi(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s1), cword(c2)), wi(w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0))))
  simp1(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4))
  disjwrdpfx(s0, s1, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), c2, c0)
  disjss2(s0, co(c0, cwwlksn, c1), crab(s1, cword(c2), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c3), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s0)), cfv(clsw, cv(s1))), c4))), crab(s1, cword(c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), cpfx, c0), cv(s0))))

  mp2(‚äî(s0 ‚àà(c0[WWalksN]c1), { s1 ‚àà Word(c2)|((s1[prefix]c0)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4)}), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0[WWalksN]c1), { s1 ‚àà Word(c2)|((s1[prefix]c0)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4)} ‚äÜ { s1 ‚àà Word(c2)|(s1[prefix]c0)= s0 }), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà(c0[WWalksN]c1), { s1 ‚àà Word(c2)|(s1[prefix]c0)= s0 }))

  ss2rabi(s1, Word(c2), ((s1[prefix]c0)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4), (s1[prefix]c0)= s0)
  a1i(s1 ‚àà Word(c2), (((s1[prefix]c0)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4)‚Üí(s1[prefix]c0)= s0))

}

  3adant3(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cword(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wa(wn(wnel(c0, universe)), wn(wnel(c1, cn0))))
  biimpri(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wn(wnel(c0, universe)), wn(wnel(c1, cn0))))

blocks.name: wlksnfi
blocks.content: The number of walks of fixed length is finite if the number of vertices is finite (in the graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 20-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm wlksnfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cfn), wcel(co(c1, cwwlksn, c0), cfn), wbr(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cen, co(c1, cwwlksn, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c1, cwwlksn, c0), cfn), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn))
  fusgrvtxfi(c0, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  wwlksnfi(c0, c1)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)), cen, co(c1, cwwlksn, c0)), wcel(c0, cuspgr))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c0, cuspgr), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  fusgrusgr(c0)
  usgruspgr(c0)
  wlknwwlksnen(s0, c0, c1)
  enfii(co(c1, cwwlksn, c0), crab(s0, cfv(cwlks, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c1)))
}

} = {

blocks.name: wwlksnextprop
blocks.content: Adding additional properties to the set of walks (as words) of a fixed length starting at a fixed vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 20-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wwlksnextprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(crab(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c2)), crab(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c3, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c2), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c4))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s2, co(c0, cwwlksn, c5), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {

thm wwlksnextpropOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ` 0)= c2 } = { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[substr]< 0,(c0[+]1)>)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c2 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c4))})
  ‚ä£ c1 =((c0[+]1)[WWalksN]c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Edg ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 = { s2 ‚àà(c0[WWalksN]c5)|(s2 ` 0)= c2 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

blocks.name: disjxwwlkn
blocks.content: Sets of walks (as words) extended by an edge are disjunct if each set contains extensions of distinct walks. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 20-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2022.)

  rgenw(s1, c1, (((s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4)‚Üí(s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0))
  simp1((s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0, (s0 ` 0)= c3, {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4)
  ss2rab(s1, c1, ((s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0 ‚àß(s0 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß {(lastS ` s0),(lastS ` s1)} ‚àà c4), (s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0)
  ax-mp({ s1 ‚àà c1 |(s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0 } ‚äÜ { s1 ‚àà Word((Vtx ` c6))|(s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0 }, c1 ‚äÜ Word((Vtx ` c6)))
  eqsstri(c1, Word((Vtx ` c6)), ((c5[+]1)[WWalksN]c6))
  sstri(((c5[+]1)[WWalksN]c6), Word((Vtx ` c6)), (WWalks ` c6))

blocks.name: hashwwlksnext
blocks.content: Number of walks (as words) extended by an edge as a sum over the prefixes. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 20-Apr-2021.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm hashwwlksnext(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), wceq(cfv(chash, crab(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5))))), csu(s1, c2, cfv(chash, crab(s0, c1, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
} = {
  hashrabrex(s0, s1, c1, c2, wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5)))
  syl5eqel(c2, cfn, crab(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4)), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn))
  sylancl(wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), wcel(crab(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4)), cfn), wcel(co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), cfn), wss(crab(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4)), co(c6, cwwlksn, c0)))
  wwlksnfi(c0, c6)
  ssrab2(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4))
  ssfi(co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), crab(s2, co(c6, cwwlksn, c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), c4)))
  adantr(wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5))), cfn))
  syl(wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c1, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5))), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  syl5eqel(c1, cfn, co(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cwwlksn, c0), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn))
  wwlksnfi(c0, co(c6, caddc, nat1))
  rabfi(s0, c1, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5)))
  a1i(wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn), wdisj(s1, c2, crab(s0, c1, w3a(wceq(co(cv(s0), cpfx, c3), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), c4), wcel(cpr(cfv(clsw, cv(s1)), cfv(clsw, cv(s0))), c5)))))
  disjxwwlkn(s1, s0, s2, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cfv(cvtx, c0), cfn)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s1)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, c6, cwwlksn, c0)
  diff.cwwlksn.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm hashwwlksnext(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí(# ` { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5))})= sum(s1 ‚àà c2,(# ` { s0 ‚àà c1 |((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5)})))
  ‚ä£ c1 =((c6[+]1)[WWalksN]c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { s2 ‚àà(c6[WWalksN]c0)|(s2 ` 0)= c4 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c6)
} = {
  hashrabrex(s0, s1, c1, c2, (Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin, ((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5))
  syl5eqel(c2, cfn, { s2 ‚àà(c6[WWalksN]c0)|(s2 ` 0)= c4 }, (Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin)
  sylancl((Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin, { s2 ‚àà(c6[WWalksN]c0)|(s2 ` 0)= c4 } ‚àà Fin, (c6[WWalksN]c0)‚àà Fin, { s2 ‚àà(c6[WWalksN]c0)|(s2 ` 0)= c4 } ‚äÜ(c6[WWalksN]c0))
  wwlksnfi(c0, c6)
  ssrab2(s2, (c6[WWalksN]c0), (s2 ` 0)= c4)
  ssfi((c6[WWalksN]c0), { s2 ‚àà(c6[WWalksN]c0)|(s2 ` 0)= c4 })
  adantr((Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin, s1 ‚àà c2, { s0 ‚àà c1 |((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5)} ‚àà Fin)
  syl((Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin, { s0 ‚àà c1 |((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5)} ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà Fin)
  syl5eqel(c1, cfn, ((c6[+]1)[WWalksN]c0), (Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin)
  wwlksnfi(c0, (c6[+]1))
  rabfi(s0, c1, ((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5))
  a1i((Vtx ` c0)‚àà Fin, ‚äî(s1 ‚àà c2, { s0 ‚àà c1 |((s0[prefix]c3)= s1 ‚àß(s1 ` 0)= c4 ‚àß {(lastS ` s1),(lastS ` s0)} ‚àà c5)}))
  disjxwwlkn(s1, s0, s2, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (Vtx ` c0), cfn)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s1)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, c6, cwwlksn, c0)
  diff.cwwlksn.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm wwlksnwwlksnon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: wspthsnonn0vne
blocks.content: If the set of simple paths of length at least 1 between two vertices is not empty, the two vertices must be different. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-May-2021.)
